sch:let.name: Simple
sch:let.value: doc:Invoice/cbc:ProfileID = 'Procurement-OrdSimR-BilSim-1.0' or doc:Invoice/cbc:ProfileID = 'Procurement-OrdAdv-BilSim-1.0' or doc:Invoice/cbc:ProfileID = 'urn:www.nesubl.eu:profiles:profile7:ver1.0' or doc:Invoice/cbc:ProfileID = 'urn:www.nesubl.eu:profiles:profile7:ver2.0'

sch:pattern.name: UBLExtensions
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the UBLExtensions class

sch:pattern.name: Profile
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating root element, Profile and UBL version

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV001] Root element must be Invoice
[F-INV336] The documenttype does not match an OIOUBL Invoice and can not be validated by this schematron.

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV002] There must be an OrderReference class for this profileID

sch:pattern.name: Invoice
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Invoice structure

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV007] Invalid DocumentCurrencyCode. Must contain a value
[F-INV008] One or more TaxTotal class must be present
[F-INV009] Invalid Invoice/ID (Invoice number). Must contain a value.
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV004] No more than one InvoicePeriod class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [W-INV010] Invalid listID. Must be '' or ''
[W-INV005] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be ''
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV011] Invalid InvoiceTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-INV337] Invalid InvoiceTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-INV012] There is a LineExtensionAmount for one or more invoice lines where the currencyID does not equal the DocumentCurrencyCode
[F-INV013] There is a LineExtensionAmount where the currencyID does not equal the DocumentCurrencyCode
[F-INV014] There is a PayableAmount where the currencyID does not equal the DocumentCurrencyCode

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV016] TaxCurrencyCode must be either DKK or EUR
[F-INV018] One TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount element must be present when TaxCurrencyCode element is used
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV339] There is a TransactionCurrencyTaxAmount where the currencyID does not equal the TaxCurrencyCode ('').
[F-INV019] There is a PriceAmount where the currencyID does not equal the PricingCurrencyCode
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV020] One PricingExchangeRate class must be present when PricingCurrencyCode element is used
[F-INV021] One PaymentExchangeRate class must be present when PaymentCurrencyCode element is used
[F-INV022] One PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate class must be present when PaymentAlternativeCurrencyCode element is used

sch:pattern.name: InvoicePeriod
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the InvoicePeriod class

sch:pattern.name: OrderReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the OrderReference class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV024] Invalid OrderReference/ID. Must contain a value.

sch:pattern.name: BillingReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the BillingReference class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV025] DebitNoteDocumentReference class must be excluded
[F-INV026] AdditionalDocumentReference class must be excluded
[F-INV295] BillingReferenceLine class must be excluded

sch:pattern.name: DespatchDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the OriginatorDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: ReceiptDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ReceiptDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: OriginatorDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the OriginatorDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: ContractDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ContractDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: AdditionalDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AdditionalDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: Signature
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Signature class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV027] Invalid Signature/ID. Must contain a value

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV297] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: AccountingSupplierParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AccountingSupplierParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV029] DataSendingCapability element must be excluded
[F-INV030] Party class must be present
[F-INV031] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
[F-INV034] One PartyLegalEntity class must be present

sch:pattern.name: AccountingCustomerParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AccountingCustomerParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV043] One Party class must be present
[F-INV044] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
[F-INV046] One Contact class must be present
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV045] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV051] Invalid AccountingCustomerParty/Contact/ID. Must contain a value.

sch:pattern.name: PayeeParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PayeeParty class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV319] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: BuyerCustomerParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the BuyerCustomerParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV061] Party class must be present

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV320] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: SellerSupplierParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the SellerSupplierParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV070] DataSendingCapability element must be excluded
[F-INV071] Party class must be present
[F-INV075] One PartyLegalEntity class must be present

sch:pattern.name: TaxRepresentativeParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the TaxRepresentativeParty class

sch:pattern.name: Delivery
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Delivery class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV082] ID element must be excluded
[F-INV083] Quantity element must be excluded
[F-INV084] MinimumQuantity element must be excluded
[F-INV085] MaximumQuantity element must be excluded
[F-INV086] ActualDeliveryTime element must be excluded
[F-INV087] LatestDeliveryDate element must be excluded
[F-INV088] LatestDeliveryTime element must be excluded
[F-INV238] DeliveryAddress class must be excluded
[F-INV089] PromisedDeliveryPeriod class must be excluded
[F-INV090] EstimatedDeliveryPeriod class must be excluded

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV239] Address is mandatory when ID is not specified
[F-INV299] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: DeliveryTerms
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the DeliveryTerms class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV101] AllowanceCharge class must be excluded
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV102] Use either ID or SpecialTerms
[W-INV301] If used, use INCO terms (ID = 'INCOTERMS')
[F-INV103] Use either LossRiskResponsibilityCode or LossRisk

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV302] Invalid DeliveryTerms/DeliveryLocation/ID. Must contain a value.

sch:pattern.name: PaymentMeans
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PaymentMeans class

sch:pattern.name: PaymentTerms
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PaymentTerms class

sch:pattern.name: PrepaidPayment
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PrepaidPayment class

sch:pattern.name: AllowanceCharge
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AllowanceCharge class

sch:pattern.name: TaxExchangeRate
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the TaxExchangeRate class

sch:pattern.name: PricingExchangeRate
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PricingExchangeRate class

sch:pattern.name: PaymentExchangeRate
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PaymentExchangeRate class

sch:pattern.name: PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate class

sch:pattern.name: TaxTotal
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the TaxTotal class

sch:pattern.name: LegalMonetaryTotal
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the LegalMonetaryTotal class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV120] Invalid LineExtensionAmount. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV122] AllowanceTotalAmount is mandatory when AllowanceCharge classes (with ChargeIndicator='false') are present
[F-INV123] ChargeTotalAmount is mandatory when AllowanceCharge classes (with ChargeIndicator='true') are present
[F-INV124] PrepaidAmount is mandatory when PrepaidPayment/PaidAmount elements are present
[F-INV125] PayableRoundingAmount is mandatory when TaxTotal/RoundingAmount elements are present
[F-INV126] The sum of InvoiceLine/LineExtensionAmount ('') elements must equal LegalMonetaryTotal/LineExtensionAmount ('')
[F-INV127] The sum of TaxTotal/TaxSubtotal/TaxAmount elements must equal TaxExclusiveAmount
[F-INV128] TaxInclusiveAmount is calculated incorrectly
[F-INV129] The sum of AllowanceCharge/Amount elements (with ChargeIndicator='false') must equal AllowanceTotalAmount
[F-INV130] The sum of AllowanceCharge/Amount elements (with ChargeIndicator='true') must equal cbc:ChargeTotalAmount
[F-INV131] The sum of PrepaidPayment/PaidAmount elements must equal PrepaidAmount
[F-INV132] The sum of TaxTotal/RoundingAmount elements must equal PayableRoundingAmount
[F-INV338] The LegalMonetaryTotal/PayableRoundingAmount must NOT be less then -10.00 or greater then 10.00.
sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV133] PayableAmount is calculated incorrectly - PayableAmount ('' ) don't match total calculation ('' )
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV134] The sum of PaymentTerms/Amount elements or the value of the first PaymentTerms/Amount must equal PayableAmount

sch:pattern.name: InvoiceLine
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the InvoiceLine class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV135] PaymentTerms class must be excluded
[F-INV136] DeliveryTerms class must be excluded
[F-INV137] Invalid InvoicedQuantity. Must contain a value
[F-INV138] One or more TaxTotal classes must be present
[F-INV139] One Price class must be present
[F-INV140] Invalid InvoiceLine/ID. Must contain a value.
sch:rule.sch:report: [W-INV237] ID must be unique within the document instance
[F-INV142] Invoice/OrderReference is mandatory when OrderLineReference class is present
[F-INV330] Only use Delivery.ActualDeliveryDate if not specified on header level (Invoice.Delivery)
[F-INV331] Only use Delivery.RequestedDeliveryPeriod if not specified on header level (Invoice.Delivery)
[F-INV332] Only use Delivery.DeliveryLocation if not specified on header level (Invoice.Delivery)
[F-INV333] Only use Delivery.DeliveryParty if not specified on header level (Invoice.Delivery)
[F-INV335] AllowanceCharge.Amount can not be negative, if InvoicedQuantity or Price.PriceAmount is not negative.
[F-INV335] AllowanceCharge.Amount can not be negative, if InvoicedQuantity or Price.PriceAmount is not negative.

[W-INV323] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () cannot be evaluated since either 'cbc:CalculationRate', 'cbc:MathematicOperatorCode' or both are not present in 'Invoice/cac:PricingExchangeRate'

sch:report.test: $unitCodeDifferent and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV326] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal InvoicedQuantity () * Price.PriceAmount () * Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate) (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00 (InvoicedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are not equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeEqual and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV344] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal ((Price.PriceAmount () / Price.BaseQuantity () ) * InvoicedQuantity ()) * Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00 (InvoicedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeNeither and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV346] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal Price.PriceAmount () * InvoicedQuantity () * Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00.

sch:report.test: $unitCodeDifferent and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < ((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent)) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV327] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal (InvoicedQuantity () * Price.PriceAmount () * Price.OrderableUnitFactorRate ()) div Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00 (InvoicedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are not equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeEqual and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < ((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual)) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV345] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal ((Price.PriceAmount () / Price.BaseQuantity () ) * InvoicedQuantity ()) div Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00 (InvoicedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeNeither and ($notFree and $noFactorRate and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < ((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual)) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV347] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal Price.PriceAmount () * InvoicedQuantity () div Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide' and OrderableUnitFactorRate is not present) +/- 1.00.

[F-INV343] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal InvoicedQuantity () * Price.PriceAmount () * Price.OrderableUnitFactorRate () +/- 1.00 (InvoicedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are not equal)

[F-INV340] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal (Price.PriceAmount () / Price.BaseQuantity () ) * InvoicedQuantity () +/- 1.00 (InvoicedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are equal)
[F-INV348] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal Price.PriceAmount () * InvoicedQuantity () +/- 1.00.

sch:report.test: $unitCodeDifferent and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV328] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal InvoicedQuantity () * Price.PriceAmount () * Price.OrderableUnitFactorRate () * Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply') +/- 1.00 (InvoicedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are not equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeEqual and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV341] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal (Price.PriceAmount () / Price.BaseQuantity () ) * InvoicedQuantity () * Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply') +/- 1.00 (InvoicedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeNeither and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Multiply) and ((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) * xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV349] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal Price.PriceAmount () * InvoicedQuantity * Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'multiply') +/- 1.00.

sch:report.test: $unitCodeDifferent and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and (((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > ((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeDifferent) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV329] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal (InvoicedQuantity () * Price.PriceAmount () * Price.OrderableUnitFactorRate ()) div Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide') +/- 1.00 (InvoicedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are not equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeEqual and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and (((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > ((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV342] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal ((Price.PriceAmount () / Price.BaseQuantity () ) * InvoicedQuantity ()) div Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide') +/- 1.00 (InvoicedQuantity unitCode and Price.BaseQuantity unitCode are equal)

sch:report.test: $unitCodeNeither and ($notFree and not($noFactorRate) and not($noExchangeRate) and not($CRandMOC) and $Divide) and (((xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) < (xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) - 01.00)) or (xs:double(cbc:LineExtensionAmount) > ((xs:double($calculatedTotalUnitCodeEqual) div xs:double(../cac:PricingExchangeRate/cbc:CalculationRate)) + 01.00)))

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV350] Invoice line '' with lineExtensionAmount () must equal Price.PriceAmount () * InvoicedQuantity () div Invoice.PricingExchangeRate.CalculationRate (when '../cac:PricingExchangeRate' is present with MathematicOperatorCode = 'divide') +/- 1.00.

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV147] Invalid InvoicedQuantity. Must not be zero

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV149] Invalid LineExtensionAmount. Must have at least 2 decimals

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV153] Invalid LineID. Must contain a value
[F-INV314] Invalid LineID. Must contain a value
[F-INV315] Invalid LineID. Must contain a value
[F-INV303] DebitNoteDocumentReference class must be excluded
[F-INV304] AdditionalDocumentReference class must be excluded
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV305] No more than one BillingReferenceLine class may be present
[F-INV306] No more than one AllowanceCharge class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV155] ID element must be excluded
[F-INV156] MinimumQuantity element must be excluded
[F-INV157] MaximumQuantity element must be excluded
[F-INV158] ActualDeliveryTime element must be excluded
[F-INV159] LatestDeliveryDate element must be excluded
[F-INV160] LatestDeliveryTime element must be excluded
[F-INV240] DeliveryAddress class must be excluded
[F-INV161] PromisedDeliveryPeriod class must be excluded
[F-INV162] EstimatedDeliveryPeriod class must be excluded

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV241] Address is mandatory when ID is not specified
[F-INV300] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV211] OriginCountry class must be excluded
[F-INV163] Invalid Name for InvoiceLine. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-INV307] No more than one Keyword element may be present
[F-INV308] No more than one BrandName element may be present
[F-INV309] No more than one ModelName element may be present
[F-INV312] No more than one ManufacturersItemIdentification class may be present
[F-INV313] No more than one AdditionalItemIdentification class may be present
[F-INV321] No more than one ItemSpecificationDocumentReference class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV167] Invalid SellersItemIdentification/ID. Must contain a value

xsl:if.Description: [F-INV171] Invalid Description. Must contain a value

Error.Description: [F-INV171] Invalid Description. Must contain a value

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV170] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value
[F-INV227] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-INV184] Use a Valid UNSPSC 19.0501 code

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV234] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-INV235] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-INV185] Invalid Item Property Group ID in InvoiceLine. Must contain a value
[F-INV228] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-INV310] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-INV311] Invalid Item Property Group ID in InvoiceLine. Must contain a value
[F-INV316] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-INV317] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-INV318] Invalid Item Property Group ID in InvoiceLine. Must contain a value
[F-INV335] cbc:ID must contain a value.
[F-INV351] Invalid cac:CertificateTypeCode: '' Must be a value from the codelist: PackagingMarkedLabelAccreditationCode from GS1 Global Data Dictionary.
[F-INV336] cac:CertificateTypeCode must contain a value.
[F-INV338] cbc:CertificateType must contain a value.

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-INV322] The ValidityPeriod class may only be used when Preordering is the case
[W-INV194] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-INV195] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-INV196] Invalid listID. Must be 'UN/ECE 5387'
